mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.text as subtype_name,c.text as prod_name,d.name as brand_name,d.name as supplier_name,f.name as store_name FROM ems_order a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id inner join ems_store f on a.store_id=f.id where a.orderId=#{orderId}
